column3: Traffic;Thailand:  A Cambodian worker has died and 14 others were seriously injured following a traffic accident at 7:30 am on November 10
column6: Thailand.------According to a report from Chanthaburi province
column7: an ISUZU pick-up carrying 15 Cambodian workers overturned
column8: killing one.------“The incident took place on a national highway in the area
column9: ” said a rescue agency source. The victims were taken to Soyao hospital and Pouk Kla Kao Hospitasl in Chan Borei.------The source added Thai authorities are conducting a search for the deceased’s identity to notify relatives. ------NKD
